_header: Saint Berinus the confessor that goodman was enough
Subjects: saints’ lives; Birinus, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Birinus in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Byrin þe confessour þat godeman was y nouhIn
                    þe toun of Rome was boren & to eche godenesse drouh…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And went to þe ioye of heuene After his lyf anonNou god
                    for þe loue of him vs bringe þider echon
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

Bod779.First Lines:
seint birrin þe comfessour þat good mon was I nowȝIn
                    þe toun of rome was bore & to ech goodnes
                    drowȝ…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& went to þe ioy of heuin out of þis erþ
                    anonnou god for þe loue of hym bring vs þedir echon

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint beryn þe confessoure þat goud man was y noweIn
                    þe toune of rome was ybore & to eche goudnesse
                    drewe…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…& wende to þe Ioie of heuene after þis lyf
                    anonnow god for þe loue of hym ous bringe þudere
                    echon

Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint birin þe confessor þat godman was ynouIn þe toun of rome was ibore & to eche godnesse drou…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …& wente to þe ioie of heuen after þis lif anonnou god for þe loue of him ous bringe þuþer echon
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxxvii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 205v).
